name: ButterFingers
description: This crew chief is prone to coordination mistakes. While they are on your team the chances of a failed pitstop are increased by 50%

name: CrewPerfectionist
description: This crew chief won't be satisfied by anything but perfection. When they change career stage they have a +10% chance of increasing Skill but a -10% chance of increasing Speed.

name: Exacting
description: This crew chief is strict and ensures proper part handlings are followed. Car parts have their minimum reliability before a mechanical failure can happen lowered by 10%.

name: FuelStrategist
description: This crew chief ensures drivers know proper fuel management techniques. While they are on your team all cars consume 5% less fuel.

name: PracticeMakesPerfect
description: This crew chief has perfected their pitstopping techniques through many failures. While they are on your team the chances of a failed pitstop are lowered by 50%

name: RiskTaker
description: This crew chief enjoys taking risks. Their pitstops have their base time lowered by 20% but are 50% more likely to fail.

name: RubberStrategist
description: This crew chief knows how to optimize and organize proper tire management. While they are on your team tires wear 10% slower.

name: Sloppy
description: This crew chief isn't the best at supervising the quality of their car parts. Car parts have their minimum reliability before a mechanical failure can happen increased by 10%.

name: SpeedDriller
description: This crew chief expects the utmost swiftness out of their crew. When they change career stage they have a +10% chance of increasing Speed but a -10% chance of increasing Skill.

name: SteadyHands
description: This crew chief takes his time to ensure proper handling. Their pitstops have their base time increased by 20% but are 50% less likely to fail.

name: TuningMaster
description: This crew chief has mastered their tuning techniques to perfection. Parts tuned by them have a +1 added to the minimum value.

name: WetStrategist
description: This crew chief knows how to tackle a race in wet environments. While they are on your team drivers gain 10% more speed on dry tires while on a wet track.
